items.sentence: Why did you decide to learn how to play the English horn?
Are you telling me that Tom doesn\'t know how to do that?
You\'re the only Canadian I know who doesn\'t like bacon.
Did Tom really drink the whole bottle of wine by himself?
Tom and Mary have lived in Boston since they got married.
Tom and Mary were married in October on a tropical beach.
Tom\'s parents told me that he would be going to Harvard.
Tom came to France with the intention of studying French.
Tom clicked a button on his remote, but nothing happened.
Tom complained that his wife was spending too much money.
Tom just told me that he doesn\'t plan to stay in Boston.
Tom is wearing the same clothes he was wearing yesterday.
Tom knew that he was supposed to be doing something else.
Tom knocked on the door and then entered without waiting.
I suspected that Tom didn\'t really want to go to Boston.
It was obvious that those two women knew each other well.
I could be wrong, but I think it\'ll rain this afternoon.
Why didn\'t you tell me that you were lactose intolerant?
Why do you keep saying things that you know aren\'t true?
You know perfectly well that things don\'t work that way.
